duties_responsibilities.duty: Support engineering activities and develop/maintain deliverable tracking and project schedule.
Author and manage equipment and process change control, as needed.
Coordinate and execute engineering testing and training activities with end users.
Manage project closeout and file transfer activities.
Lead validation and qualification activities to support the qualification of various equipment.
Apply technical and functional knowledge to assist in experiment/project design.
Work independently on a broad range of difficult problems and suggest new, innovative solutions to problems.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Chemical, Mechanical, or Electrical Engineering or appropriate scientific discipline (Master's preferred)
3+ years of Process/Project Engineering related experience
2+ years in a regulated industry (Drug Substance preferred)
Access to Maximo, Trackwise, and EDMS/MES preferred
Must be able to read and understand English-written job instructions and safety requirements
